title: Partition Sector
notes: Steam has 3 reviews (no score). SteamDB shows 69.20% positive (4 reviews); tiny sample keeps score moderate.
raw_comment: Bomberman-like game with 6 game modes: Classic, Deathmatch, CTF, Battle Royale (individual or team), King of the Hill, Snake Hunter. Up to 20 local players. 16 gamepads + 4 keyboard. Shared screen.
